actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act and the Controlled Substances Import and Export Act with respect to penalties for powder cocaine and crack cocaine offenses.
short_title: Powder-Crack Cocaine Penalty Equalization Act of 1998

summary.text: Powder-Crack Cocaine Penalty Equalization Act of 1998 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act and the Controlled Substances Import and Export Act to make prohibitions and penalties for the manufacture, distribution, sale, possession, importation, or exportation of crack cocaine applicable to the same amounts of powdered cocaine.

titles.title: Powder-Crack Cocaine Penalty Equalization Act of 1998
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act and the Controlled Substances Import and Export Act with respect to penalties for powder cocaine and crack cocaine offenses.
